name: The Messenger of God Appearing to Joshua
description: The Messenger of God Appearing to Joshua; Ferdinand Bol (Dutch, 1616 - 1680); about 1640 - 1644; Pen and brown ink, brown and gray wash, and red, white and black chalk; 27.1 × 19.5 cm (10 11/16 × 7 11/16 in.); 87.GG.81; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Messenger of God Appearing to Joshua
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown and gray wash, and red, white and black chalk
